import axios from"axios";var instance=axios.create({withCredentials:true,baseURL:'https://hivebot.info/api/v1/'//headers: {'API-KEY' : 'ed386668-28b4-45de-98f4-ed82c5c0ecc4'}
});export var tagsAPI={getTags:function getTags(){return instance.get("tags").then(function(response){return response.data;});},postTags:function postTags(tags){return instance.post("tags",tags,{headers:{"Content-Type":'application/json'}}).then(function(response){console.log(response);return response.data;});},upTags:function upTags(id){return instance.put("tags/up/".concat(id),{},{headers:{"Content-Type":'application/json'}}).then(function(response){console.log(response);return response.data;});},downTags:function downTags(id){return instance.put("tags/down/".concat(id),{},{headers:{"Content-Type":'application/json'}}).then(function(response){console.log(response);return response.data;});}};
